title: PhonePe | SDE-1 | Offer
content:
Education: Tier - 1 (old IIT circuital)
Years of Experience: 7 months at a fintech MNC
Date of the Offer: Feb 2025
Company: PhonePe
Title/Level: Software Engineer (PhonePe has flat hierarchy)
Location: Bangalore (5 days WFO)
Salary: 19.25L
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: ESOPS: 8.5L vested over 4 years
Bonus: None
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 22.25L + ESOPS 
Benefits: Standard PhonePe Benefits
Other details: Tried to negotiate but the recruiter won't budge.

I feel like this offer is a low-ball given that they already offer 5L joining bonus on-campus. Negotiation can work only if I have a counter-offer which I don't currently have. I'm trying to get another offer in the meanwhile. Is there anything else that the community recommends?

title: Microsoft |  SDE-2 ( L61 ) | Offer – Salary & Negotiation Advice
content:
Education: B.Tech (IIT, CSE)
Years of Experience: 3.5 years
Prior Experience: Product-based company (Current)

Date of the Offer: February 2025
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE-2 (L61)
Location: Bangalore, India

Salary: 31 LPA
Signing Bonus: 4 LPA (Year 1) + 2 LPA (Year 2)
Stock bonus: $80K USD over 4 years (~16.5 LPA/year)
Bonus: 0-20% of base (assuming ~3.1 LPA)
Total Comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):

1st year: ~55 LPA
2nd year: ~53 LPA
3rd & 4th year: ~51 LPA
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits (not explicitly discussed yet)

Other details:
My current compensation:

Base: 25 LPA
Stocks: 30 LPA (due to significant stock appreciation)
Bonus: 5 LPA
Total: ~60 LPA
Expected next year: ~50+ LPA (Base: 25, Stocks: 15, Bonus: 5)

Hitting stock cliff for one grant this year but expecting a good hike, so total should be ~50+ after June.
Will share my interview experience soon.

Would appreciate insights on:
Is this a fair offer for SDE-2 (L61) at Microsoft India?
Any tips on negotiating a better base salary, RSUs, or signing bonus?
Thanks in advance!
